description: hurry.file is an advanced ope 3 file widget which tries its best to behavelike other widgets, even when the form is redisplayed due to a validationerror. It also has built-in support for fast Apache-based file uploadsand downloads through Tramline.
longdescription: hurry.file is an advanced ope 3 file widget which tries its best to behavelike other widgets, even when the form is redisplayed due to a validationerror. It also has built-in support for fast Apache-based file uploadsand downloads through Tramline.
